content: gives a bit of support as you are working begin by sewing the four points together in the middle of the cushion and then work the first seam take a stitch from the end of every other ridge alternating between the two sides the path of the stitches is basically a zigzag 9 and that s all there is to it i can t decide which side i like best ccoorrnneerrss iinn …… … or corners out abbreviations k knit w&t wrap and turn explained on page 4 join explained on page 3 © frankie brown © 2025 mypatterns areforpersonaluseonlyandshouldnotbeusedtoknititems forsale pleasedonotusethemforteachingpurposes withoutmypermission 10
